profiles.about:
Iâ€™m Sameer Dhakal, a backend-focused Web Developer and Web3 enthusiast with a passion for building scalable, functional, and production-ready web applications.

My core strength is in backend development, where I work with technologies like Python (Django/Flask), JavaScript (Node.js/Express), and PHP to design systems that handle authentication, role-based access, booking logic, dashboards, and APIs. I enjoy turning complex requirements into clean, maintainable code.

projects.title: Django Reservation System
projects.description:
A modern Reservation Management System built with Django + TailwindCSS, allowing users to register, log in, and manage reservations easily.
Deployed live on Render.

projects.title: Local Services Marketplace
projects.description:
This is a web-based marketplace where service providers (plumbers, electricians, tutors, cleaners, freelancers, etc.) can list their services, and customers can search, book, and review them.

The goal of this project is to demonstrate:

Real business logic
Role-based authentication & permissions
Booking & availability systems
Scalable backend thinking with Django

projects.title: PHP Blog Project
projects.description:
A simple, dynamic Blog Management System built using PHP, MySQL, and Bootstrap.
This project demonstrates CRUD operations, authentication, and responsive design .
projects.tech_stack: Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript (Vanilla) Backend: PHP Database: MySQL

certifications.title: Responsive Web Design
certifications.description: Fundamentals of HTML and CSS, including modern layout, design, accessibility, and responsive web development.
